intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: This is it! Our final battle! You're one of us, Robin, and no "destiny" can change that. Now let's kill this dastard and be done with it!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Robin, we have to get closer. Let's move!

battle.speaker: Validar
battle.line: Ha ha ha! Why do you resist?

battle.speaker: Chrom
battle.line: Good, he's almost within reach. Let's move in and strike!

boss.speaker: Validar
boss.line: Gya ha ha! Fools! Struggle all you want! You cannot unwrite what is already written!

character-falls.speaker: Chrom
character-falls.line: Robin, I...I'm Sorry. Just..run while you can...

character-falls.speaker: Validar
character-falls.line: Gya ha ha! You can't escape it! That's why it's called destiny!

character-falls.speaker: Chrom
character-falls.line: Robin! No! This can't be how it ends!

character-falls.speaker: Validar
character-falls.line: Heh heh heh... GYA HA HA HA!

end.speaker: Validar
end.line: This isn't over... Damn you BOTH!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Are you all right? That's the end of him. Thanks to you we carried the day. We can rest easy now.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: This is not your— your fault... Promise me you'll escape from this place... Please, go...
